price: Ya ce: "Kunã shũka, shẽkara bakwai tutur, sa'an nan abin da kuka girbe, sai ku bar shi, a cikin zanganniyarsa,* sai kaɗan daga abin da kuke ci."
arabic: قَالَ تَزۡرَعُونَ سَبۡعَ سِنِينَ دَأَبٗا فَمَا حَصَدتُّمۡ فَذَرُوهُ فِي سُنۢبُلِهِۦٓ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا مِّمَّا تَأۡكُلُونَ
footnotes: * Barin hatsi a cikin zangarniyarsa shĩ ne mãganin ruɓewarsa, kõ waɗansu tsũtsõtsi da suke cin sa.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla tazraʿūna sabʿa sinīna da-aban famā ḥaṣadttum fadharūhu fī sunbulihi illā qalīlan mimmā takulūna
